Job Description:
Position: Software Developer

Roles and Responsibilities:

Requirement gathering,  design,  development,  testing of web applications using ASP .net

Maintain existing websites by identifying and correcting software defects.

Design architecture and develop new web based applications.

Create technical specifications and test plans.

Ability to working with team and meet project deadlines.

Strong problem solving skills.

Skill Set:

Knowledge of the .NET 2.0/ 3.5/ 4.0 Framework,  including Visual Studio 2008,  C#,  ASP.NET

SQL Server 2008 R2 and 2012

Building large- scale web applications using .Net,  JavaScript and Ajax,  JQuery,  HTML,  CSS,  XML,  XSL,  XSLT

Exceptional Programming skills with strong fundamentals in Object Oriented Programming

Understanding of IIS 7.5 & Deployment Web Projects

Experienced in Web Forms and Web Services

Manage live server settings and configuration

HTML5,  DHTML

MVC experience would be a plus

Added advantage of SSRS,  SSIS

Experience: 1- 2 years of experience.

Qualifications: Any Graduate/ Post Graduate

Industry: IT Company

CTC bracket: As per Industry standards
